subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Maple Leafs, an Original Six franchise, lured Mike Babcock from Detroit with an eight-year, $50 million deal as they seek their first Stanley Cup in nearly a half century.
snippet: The Maple Leafs, an Original Six franchise, lured Mike Babcock from Detroit with an eight-year, $50 million deal as they seek their first Stanley Cup in nearly a half century.
